sentences: Teatris on kolm kohti: peasaal, väike saal ja black box.
Black box teatris on mustaks värvinud seintega ruum, mida saab vabalt muuta.
Meie koolis on ka väiksem black box koht, kus me harjutame etendusi.
context: In Estonian theater terminology, 'kohti' refers to a flexible performance space known as a 'black box'. This is a theater room with black-painted walls that is not divided into separate stage and auditorium areas. The space can be freely rearranged depending on the production needs. 'Kohti' in this context means these types of versatile theater spaces, which are common in modern theater buildings alongside larger traditional auditoriums.
